name: Insectopia (Demo)
description:
(This is a demo, everything is subject to change. Thank you for your understanding!)

"Welcome to Konchu Prefecture, a land overrun with giant insects! Catch, tame, and battle your insects to become the best bug tamer in the world!"

Insectopia is a Pokemon-inspired RPG for the GameBoy and GameBoy Color! It's made with GB Studio by Chris Maltby and made with help from https://lazydevs.itch.io/

Controls for GameBoy and PC are:

  • A/Z to interact
  • B/X to go back
  • D-Pad/Arrow Keys to move
  • Start/Enter for the menu

Things being worked on for the full version of the game include:

  • Trainer Battles
  • Gym Leaders
  • An expanded world and story
  • XP and levels
  • Music

Please report any bugs or issues to me via @Tay_Boop on Twitter!

Thank You!
